field_list.label: Medicare Levy Section
field_list.description: Questions to determine your Medicare levy and Medicare levy surcharge obligations.

sub_fields.label: M1 - Number of Dependent Children (Y code)
sub_fields.description: Number of dependent children and students for family income reduction purposes (Y code).

sub_fields.label: M2 - Private Hospital Cover (Full Year)?
sub_fields.description: Were you and all dependants covered by private patient hospital cover for the whole period 1 July 2024 to 30 June 2025?

sub_fields.label: M2 - Private Hospital Cover Details
sub_fields.description: Details required for partial or no private hospital cover during the year, as per your health fund statement.

sub_fields.label: Health Fund Tax Statement Number
sub_fields.description: The Health Insurance Policy Statement number (A, B, C, or D) provided by your health fund.

input_format.format_guide: Enter statement number (e.g., A, B, C, or D)
